title: 1(2) of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited institutional burial act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: 1(2) of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 2. The 15th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 

Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 July, 2022. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, 
Disability, Integration and Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [356] 3
